attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have just looked on Facebook and seen there is a group set up Called 'Get Huntley of Facebook'. 
How wrong can this be, not only does he have access to a computer and the world wide web, he is alowed to join social networking groups. I thought he was supposed to be in a high security jail. What is our contry coming to. Where we let our criminals still be part of society.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
